sm::eod::io::SerializableCompressorDecoderFactory

SerializableCompressorDecoderFactory Class Reference

#include <serializablecompressordecoderfactory.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Factory for creating decoders.

Each CompressedSerializable contains streams encoded with a codec. This factory is used to instantiate a decoder for handling the data within a stream.

bool haveDecoder ( CodecID  id  )  const

Checks if a codec has been registered.

Parameters:
id A codec id to lookup
Returns:
true if the codec was registered with registerDecoder

SerializableCompressorDecoder* newDecoder ( CodecID  id  )  const

Creates a decoder for the codec id.

Returns:
A decoder or NULL if id is unknown. Ownership of the decoder is transferred to the caller.

void registerDecoder ( CodecID  id,
CreatorImpl  creator 
)

Registers a decoder with a creation functor.

If the codec id was previously registered it is overwritten.

Parameters:
id The codec id.
creator The functor(SerializableCompressorDecoder*(void)) for creating the decoder.
Precondition:
creator is not NULL.

Definition at line 49 of file serializablecompressordecoderfactory.h.

void registerDecoder ( CodecID  id  ) 

Registers a decoder via its type. The default constructor is used to initialize the codec. If the codec id was previously registered it is overwritten.

Parameters:
id The codec id.
